items.title: S&P 500 futures and dollar dip as Trump revives tariff tension
‘My whole financial world is upside down’: I’m ‘medically retired’ at 51 with $428K in stocks. Is this enough to live on?
items.description: “We don’t know where we will retire. It could be South Carolina, Georgia, Alabama, Mississippi or Texas.”

items.title: ‘I’m single’: At 70, I have $500,000 in stocks and $220,000 in savings. How do I invest my $130,000 windfall?
items.description: “I’m receiving enough Social Security to live on.”

items.title: ‘I do all the yard work, cooking and cleaning’: I live with my daughter and her lazy boyfriend. She wants me to buy her house. Do I say yes?
items.description: “When I say anything, I am immediately wrong, unless my daughter wants something.”
